name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS
description: This table contains the Counts information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line (ORM) record

columns.name: COUNT_XRAY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not an X-ray was performed for this count record. Y indicates the X-ray was used, while N indicates that the X-ray was not used. This item may be set in the event of an incorrect count, therefore it could be null, usually indicating a correct count.

columns.name: COUNT_MD_NTFD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the physician was notified for this count record. Y indicates the physician was notified, while N indicates that the physician was not notified. This item may be set in the event of an incorrect count, therefore it could be null, usually indicating a correct count.

columns.name: COUNT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the count was taken.

columns.name: COUNT_PERFORMD_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the time when a count is performed.

columns.name: COUNT_MD_NOTIFIED_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores when the physician was notified during an incorrect count.

columns.name: COUNT_XRAY_TAKEN_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores when the X-ray was taken during a count.

columns.name: COUNT_ALL_CLEAR_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the time when all clear was called as part of a count.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is a category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM1_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is intended to be used if a user selects "other" as the category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM1_TOTAL
columns.description: The total of this type of item that was counted.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM2_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is a category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM2_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is intended to be used if a user selects "other" as the category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM2_TOTAL
columns.description: The total of this type of item that was counted.

columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is a category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM3_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is intended to be used if a user selects "other" as the category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM3_TOTAL
columns.description: The total of this type of item that was counted.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM4_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is a category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM4_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is intended to be used if a user selects "other" as the category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM4_TOTAL
columns.description: The total of this type of item that was counted.

columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is a category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM5_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: Stores the item being counted in the current count. This is intended to be used if a user selects "other" as the category list value.

columns.name: COUNTS_ITEM5_TOTAL
columns.description: The total of this type of item that was counted.
